document.docAuthor: Obando, Ranulfo González, García, Alfonso N. & Carrejo, Nancy Soraya
document.docTitle: Steleops plenitudensis Obando, García & Carrejo, 2011, n. sp.
document.masterDocTitle: New species of Steleops (Psocodea: ‘ Psocoptera’: Psocidae) from Brazil, Colombia, Mexico and Peru

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: New species of Steleops (Psocodea: ‘ Psocoptera’: Psocidae) from Brazil, Colombia, Mexico and Peru

caption.paragraph:
FIGURES 55−60 .
Steleops plenitudensis
n. sp.
Male. 55. Fore wing and Hind wing. 56. Side view of genitalia: Clunium, paraprocts-epiproct and hypandrium. 57. Front view of head. 58. Phallosome. 59. Paraprocts and epiproct. 60. Hypandrium. Scales in mm.

FIGURES 61−65 .
Steleops plenitudensis
n. sp.
Female. 61. Fore wing and Hind wing. 62. Front view of head. 63. Subgenital plate. 64. Left gonapophyses and spermapore. 65. Paraprocts and epiproct. Scales in mm.
